name: Sanqing Mountains Loop
description: Enjoy this 16.4-km loop trail near Shangrao, Jiangxi. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 8 h 12 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, camping, and hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

name: Wugongshan_ Longshan Village to Dongjiang Village
description: Get to know this 14.0-km point-to-point trail near Pingxiang, Jiangxi. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 7 h 45 min to complete. This is a very popular area for backpacking, camping, and hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

name: Mount Lu
description: Explore this 19.8-km point-to-point trail near Jiujiang, Jiangxi. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 8 h 27 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Dayueshan
description: Enjoy this 6.3-km out-and-back trail near Jiujiang, Jiangxi. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 15 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Sanbai Mountain
description: Discover this 2.3-km loop trail near Ganzhou Shi, Jiangxi. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 49 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Mount Lu Loop
description: Experience this 20.9-km loop trail near Jiujiang, Jiangxi. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 7 h 37 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.
